hotel.title: Hotel
hotel.description: The hotel has capacity for 57 people.

restaurant.title: Restaurant
restaurant.description: Maximum capacity of 57 people. Meeting and event room.

wifi.title: WiFi
wifi.description: WiFi in all areas of the resort.

panelId1.title: How to book?
panelId1.description: In order to book a room you have to log in to Booking. You can find the links in the Contacts section.

panelId2.title: Check-In y Check-Out
panelId2.description: The check-in to the resort is from 14:00 to 20:00. Check-out time is 11:00.

panelId3.title: Cancellation/Prepayment
panelId3.description: Cancellation and prepayment conditions may vary according to the type of accommodation. Please consult the conditions of the selected room by any of our means of communication.

panelId4.title: How much does it cost to stay?
panelId4.description: Prices at Venecia Hotel may vary depending on the stay (dates, hotel conditions, etc.). Choose your dates to see the price.

panelId5.title: What are the types of rooms?
panelId5.description: The resort has 2 types of rooms: double rooms and triple rooms. There are no cribs or extra beds in this accommodation.

panelId6.title: Payment methods
panelId6.description: We currently accept card payments (reserve the right to temporarily charge an amount prior to check-in) and only cash payments.

panelId7.title: Pets
panelId7.description: We currently accept small pets (up to 10kg). An extra charge of â‚¬10 will be added to the rate.

panelId8.title: What can be done?
panelId8.description: You can have dinner in our restaurant. Private events can be organized: business meetings, trainings, etc. You can watch live football.
